author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

We had the chance to go hands-on with Resident Evil Requiem at an Nvidia event at Gamescom - this was the maxed out PC experience, running with path-traced lighting and DLSS on an RTX 5090-based system. John and Alex share their reactions to this impressive demo.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Introduction 
01:03 Path tracing advantages 
04:39 Path tracing instability 
05:55 Overall demo thoughts
title: Resident Evil Requiem PC Path Tracing - Hands-On First Look!
